name: Water Swimming Diving Race Pro
description:
OXO Games Studio presents this 3D water swimming game that enable you to unleash the passion of swim & dive in deep water. Minimise the fear of water phobia and play this outstanding swimming pool adventure game.

Delve into deep water swimming competition with freestyle swimming and become a champion in this legendary swimming race competition. Enjoy the pool side while competing for the top position by defeating your rival swimmers and gaining victory in the water sports championship.

JOIN US ON SOCIAL NETWORKS:
- OXO 3D Studio Website: http://oxoapps.com
- Join our Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/oxo3d
- OXO 3D Studio on Twitter: @Oxo3d

WE LOVE TO HEAR:

IMPORTANT MESSAGE FOR CUSTOMERS:
* This is free game especially for Sports game, Racing game, Swimming game and Simulation game lovers.
